title: (31001) Pamplona - s/n Calle Hilarión Eslava

title: (31014) Pamplona - 2-786 Paseo Anelier
description: This car park is currently a limited parking zone, so you must be a neighbor or have an authorization ticket. Therefore, it can be used for a few hours but not permanently. From 8:00 p. M. To 8:00 a. M., there are no limitations, so it can be used overnight. In principle, it is a fairly quiet and safe residential area. There shouldn't be any problem. But be careful of the hours of use.

title: (31001) Pamplona - Unnamed Road
description: Narrow parking but very close to the center. It seems calm.

title: (31014) Pamplona - 20 Paseo Anelier
description: Laundry from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: (31002) Pamplona - 29 Calle Navas de Tolosa
description: Very nice public toilets next to the park.

title: (31014) Pamplona - 1-409 Avenida Guipúzcoa
description: Conveniently located. Motorhome parking space with supply and disposal including electricity. Approximately 800 m walk to the old town, lots of parks and greenery nearby for walking the dog. Rather less suitable for larger mobiles over 8 meters.

title: (31001) Pamplona - 30 Calle de Zapatería
description: Laundry

title: (31014) Pamplona - 1423 Avenida de Gipuzkoa Etorbidea
description: Looks like new Tarmac layer on this very large car park. Can easily take 10m plus motorhomes at bottom part next to dog walk area. First 24hrs free, have to pay if over. Number plate recognition barrier on way in. Same on exit so system knows if over 24hrs. There is payment machine by barriers all in Spanish. Great if self suffient for 24 hrs.

title: (31001) Pamplona - 4BIS Calle Redín
description: Drinking water fountain

title: (31011) Pamplona - 1B Calle Biurdana
description: Outdoor parking with a side where there is shade. There are no restaurant services. Quiet and next to a green area.

title: (31003) Pamplona - C Yanguas y Miranda 2
description: Guarded and shaded parking for motorhomes inside the bus station, Centro Pamplona. 3 Euros hour 15 Euros Day.

title: (31015) Pamplona - 1324 Camino Caparroso
description: Parking near the city center surrounded by a park with a lake. Very quiet place, drinking fountains at each end of the parking lot. Not suitable for vehicles over 5.50 meters long. Excellent location (5 minutes walk from the bullring, 8 minutes from the cathedral). Most of the parking spaces are also very straight. When you cross the stone bridge at the entrance there is a public WC that cleans itself after each use.

title: (31012) Pamplona - 2719 Calle Ferrocarril
description: Parking behind the railway tracks. In the ground, quite flat (easily recoverable). Ideally located for visiting the city…access to heavy vehicles……

title: (31013) Ansoáin - Calle Berriozar Kalea
description: Free parking for motorhomes, without restrictions. It is in Ansoain on the municipal border with Pamplona. Nearby are various services (gas station, supermarket, garbage can, fountain, etc).

title: (31014) Pamplona - 47 Calle Francisco Javier Saenz de Oiza
title_short: (31014) Pamplona - 47 Calle Francisco Javier Saenz de Oiza
description: Parking on a quiet road and next to a park and supermarkets. 15 minutes walk from Pamplona Centro. We stayed there for 4 days with no problems.

address.street: 47 Calle Francisco Javier Saenz de Oiza

title: (31007) Pamplona - 1BIS Calle Vuelta del Castillo
description: Orange parking area. Near the center and in a very large park with trees and a bike path.

title: (31012) Pamplona - 2-734 Avenida de Gipuzkoa Etorbidea
description: Free parking in front of the park in a quiet area

title: (31015) Pamplona - 8 Avenida Corella
description: Free dissuasive parking. No blue zone.

title: (31015) Pamplona - 78G Calle Padre Adoáin
description: Parking along the street, therefore possible for long vehicles. Between residential buildings and a park. 15 minutes walk from the entrance to Pamplona by the Porte de France through the walls. Ideal for visiting the city, you feel safe.

title: (31007) Pamplona - 12 Calle Abejeras
description: Washing center, clean cheap

title: (31002) Pamplona - 47 Avenida de la Baja Navarra
title_short: (31002) Pamplona - 47 Avenida de la Baja Navarra
description: Highly recommended parking to visit the old town of Pamplona, ​​next to the crescent park, dead end street and super quiet.  You can leave the van or motorhome quietly and go to visit the city in a moment

title: (31012) Pamplona - 18 PA-34
description: Running of the bulls! How good!. 30 mins walk in, toilets and really cheap cafe nearby. Water fountain at the playground. Large park with a few trees for shade. Absolutely unreal

title: (31013) Ansoáin - 93 Calle Larrazko
description: Free and signposted parking in the industrial complex for campers.

title: (31015) Pamplona - 58 Camino Burlada
description: Along a small road for a day stop. We stayed there for lunch. All the other parking lots were full.

title: (31013) Artica - 21 Carretera de Artica
description:
Self service laundry in the repsol petrol station. There is a carpark beside the station.

Best dryers we have come across.
Noticed the lpg is good value here also.

title: (31013) Artica - 1 Calle Auzalor
description:
Parking al lado de las piscinas municipales (100m) y de una gasolinera Respsol (200 m).
la zona no tiene mucho árboles, pero por 13 euros por persona puedes entrar a las piscinas (cubierta, SPA, termoludica, toboganes...) tiene un bar y aseos abiertos al público.
también un txikipark que cuesta 2 euros.
Al lado del barrio de Artica que cuenta con todo y a 500 m del centro de salud de Buztintxuri (atiende urgencias hasta las 20 de la tarde).
se puede ir al centro de Pamplona por un carril bici que se toma desde la zona de Las piscinas y va paralelo a las vías del tren.
Al lado de la carretera pero por la noche es una zona muy tranquila.
Parking ideal para subir a Ezkaba

title: (31013) Ansoáin - 20 Polígono Sector Sd
description: Small parking north of Pamplona. At the edge of a hill. You can hear the highway nearby but ideal for spending a night.

title: (31013) Ansoáin - 17AP Calle Larrazko
description: Ample and free parking without limitations, garden to the side. 3 km walk from the center

title_short: (31013) Ansoáin - 9 Calle José María Jimeno Jurío

description: Public parking. First 24 hours free

title: (31600) Burlada - 17 Calle Zubialdea

title: (31016) Pamplona - 1G Calle Ramón Aguinaga

title: (31008) Pamplona - 1-360 Calle Ermitagaña

Better to park on the side next to the library and conservatory, where there are security cameras. There is also light. As a downside, the noise emitted I suppose that the air conditioning of the library, but you can sleep without problem.

title: (31008) Pamplona - 64 Avenida de Barañáin
description: Laundry room with washing machines and dryers. Next to a big-ish parking and a Carrefour market. Free WiFi available.

title: (31006) Pamplona - M5 Calle del Sadar

title: () Pamplona -
description: Parking in a dead end street. Very little traffic and calm. Big and long pitches. Possible for 7 meter motorhomes. Ideal to visit the city and spend the night in peace. Behind a Repsol gas station. Green areas nearby.

title: (31006) Pamplona - 57 Calle Tajonar
description: Mostly empty parking lot (and plenty of others nearby also), plenty of space, though not very even. Slept the night here no problems. Also around a 1-2k/15 min walk into the town.

title: (31013) Berriozar - 1 Calle Wangari Maathai
description: Parking between buildings. The area is close but lonely, so all motor homes are parked here. Give more security.

title: (31013) Berriozar - 34 Calle San Agustín
description: Laundry 10 minutes from the Berriozar area.

title: (31013) Berriozar - 1 Avenida Berriozar
description:
Municipality area, Berriozar. Free all year and you pay by water or electricity card (There is 1 socket on the pole that gives 1 hour of light or 100 liters of water) EXCEPT from July 5 to 15, parking becomes paid, charged per Night and is included in this light fee.
Bus 16 or 17 to the center of Pamplona. In addition, it is constantly monitored by the municipal police.

title: (31013) Berriozar - NA-4106
description: Place at the end of the small asphalt road or border, we spent the night without problem

title: (31009) Pamplona - 14T Avenida de Aróstegui

title: (31600) Pamplona -

title: (31194) Azoz - 10A Calle San Lorenzo

title: () Berrioplano - Camino de San Cristóbal

title: (31191) - 2 Paseo Comercial Galaria Calle S
description: Automatic car wash with a maximum height of 2.90, width max. 2.38 and maximum length of 7 meters. It cannot be accessed with a bike rack. Ideal motorhomes and vans. There is also a manual washing box especially high for vans and motorhomes, it has a ladder to clean the roof.

title: (31194) - NA-4210
description: Parking with picnic table, shade, water, next to a river. Departure cycle track for Pamplona 9 km. Dish for one or two vans for the night. Campsite 300 m away with possible pool access (for a fee)

title: (31620) Huarte - 1 Avenida Ugarrandia

name: Camping Ezcaba

title: (31621) Egüés - 25AP Calle Elizmendi

title: (31620) Huarte - 11BIS Avenida Ugarrandia
description:
Laundry, laundry, self-service, loading and unloading parking at the door, playground at 20m. cafeteria and bars at 20m.
New, in a very safe town and next to Iruñea - Pamplona, 4 minutes by car from the Oteiza museum, 2 minutes from the Itaroa shopping center and ice skating rink.

title: (31620) Huarte - 67 Urbanizacion Zokoa

title: (31620) Huarte - 66 Urbanización Zokoa

title: (31620) Sarriguren - 3 Avenida Olaz
description: Quiet and calm alternative to armored camper vans parking It is an outline of a street with sidewalk parking and lighting 1oo from a discount service station and 150 meters from the mercadona there is a Mac do at 200 meters and a king burger A 100 meters towards the king burger there is a second street sketch

title: (31110) Noáin - 19 Carretera Pamplona

title: (31470) Noáin - Calle Camino Otano

title: (31172) Iza - NA-7064

name: Camping IZARPE Kanpina
title: (31867) Camping IZARPE Kanpina

Lovely staff and food, a few live music evenings. The owners manage the site. Note: Electrical connection requires a European two-prong adapter rather than a standard UK three-prong.

title: () Ciriza - Carretera Estella

title: (31697) Erro - NA-2331

Quiet parking, in front of barbecues, picnic tables, river and Roman bridge.

The town is beautiful, very quiet. Just behind the parking lot is the Camino de Santiago.

Play park and municipal swimming pool 1 block away.

Great to spend 1 day.

title_short: (31630) Zubiri - 39 Avenida de Roncesvalles Orreagako Etorbidea

title: (31630) Zubiri - 56 Calle Río Arga
description: Service station with “paying” terminal with tokens at the back. BUT the pump attendant made us fill our tank at the tap (provide a large nozzle) and empty our toilet cassette for free

title: (31860) Irurtzun -
description: Place at the end of the road, gravel, partially even. Parking spot for climbing or starting point for hikes. The access is a little steep but feasible. Suitable for minivans, not really for campers.

title: (31175) Izurzu - 10 Calle San Andrés
description: Flat space outside a curve of a track in good condition, little or no traffic.

title: (31860) Irurtzun - 8 Oskía Kalea
description: Parking without services, to sports center, quiet night

title: (31797) Larraintzar - 8C Calle San Pedro
description: Esplanade with the Ultzama Social Services Association. Near the pediment and the health center. The center of the village is about 300 meters after the road.

title: (31860) Irurtzun - 26 Trinitate Kalea
description: Parking without services, next to the paying Aire. From this place the Plazaola greenway passes, which can be done both on foot and by bicycle. And there are also different mountain trails, including the viewpoint of the vultures. Very good place. Water fountain beside the parking.

title: (31860) Irurzun - 5 Camino Cementerio
description: Payment area, with shopping and restaurant services about 500 meters in the town of Irurtzun, also cleaning and maintenance of bicycles, and next to a greenway for walking.

title: (31396) Unzué - 15 Calle la Peña
description: Fabulous views from cemetery above Unzué village. Small road to access but doable in our 20 year old van :-)  Peaceful night although windy, greeted by a local walking his dogs during breakfast

title: (31396) Unzué - 32-B1 Calle San Millán
description: Small parking facing the church. Slightly sloping (easily correctable). We stayed here for one night and two days without being disturbed. Very little passage, only the church that rings without being disturbing so far.

title: (31860) Irurtzun - 42 Bi Ahizpe Kalea
description: Suitable place to make a stop to eat or rest. Levelled, at the entrance of the town and near the highway.

title: (31396) Unzué - NA-5010
description: Spot in the middle of nature shaded far from the easy access road dirt track starting point of hiking and mountain biking trails.

title: (31396) Unzué - 8 Calle San Millán
description: Going up towards Unzué, follow the indication to the left of Parking (P), it does not appear on Google Maps, it must be quite new. Gravel parking, about 30 delimited spaces. 2 picnic tables and a fountain with drinking water. A paved track goes directly to the town. There are no height limits, and no overnight prohibition. There is a very nice circular excursion to climb the Peña Urzué with good views.

title: (31152) Muruzábal - NA-6063
description: Perfect for cool water. The place is very charming with its small church.

title: (31697) Urniza -
description: Enough space for 2-3 motorhomes. Near to the road, but not much traffic. Calm at night. Next to a river.

name: Ermita de San Martín
title: (31154) Ermita de San Martín
description: Parking in hermitage SAN Martín de ainorbe, very good view, quiet place but without water or bathroom

title: (31100) Villanueva - Calle Sta. Agueda
description: A short offroad drive about 3 kilometers from the main road in the mountains to the small chapel .4x4 is an advantage and not higher than 3 meters then you will find a magnificent view and a quiet place.

title: (31797) Orkin - Carr. del Ultzama
description: Recommended area only to make a stop on the way. It is quite noisy due to the traffic as it is right on the N121A road. You will find a place in both directions and it has some stone benches.

title: (31869) Latasa - NA-4130
description: Flat grassy area in a former small quarry, along the NA4130. Calmed down.

title: (31697) Erro - N-135
description: Pass, set back from the car stop and the road

title: (31798) Lanz - 7 Calle Santa Cruz
description: Parking (pre) indicated in the village, street on the left coming from the N121a, 55km from Behobia (border), 25 km from Pamplona

title: (31868) Etxarren - Sakanako Autobia
description: Nothing special but for emergency rest/spend the night. We stayed one night without problems. Some noise but acceptable.

title: (31481) Aoiz - Carretera de Aoiz
description: Picnic area along the road but separated by a hedge. Stone tables and benches. Passage of cars a little noisy, but not permanent. Night possible a priori.

title: (31291) Guirguillano - Calle las Huertas
description: Beautiful lonely spot. Good internet reception. The driveway is only recommended in good weather with a 2wd (with enough ground clearance).

title: (31868) Egiarreta - Calle San Vicente
description: Dead end in a forest. Hidden and quiet! Room for a van, or even two if you are together. Possibility to lay flat with the calles.

title: (31868) - NA-7501
description: A very quiet place, next to the hermitage. 3-4 seats. A good place to see stars, with a playground and public restrooms, as well as tables and different bins for recycling. Departure of several routes to do with children.

title: (31638) Eugi -
description: Dirt surface near the road. Possibility for 2 or 3 motorhomes. Very nice view of the lake and the village. Very quiet night because the road is not very busy at this time

title: (31869) Latasa - 15 Calle San Esteban
description: Day and night parking next to the Plazaola greenway. We spent a very quiet night. Bar next door and artisan bakery 50m away, they make pizzas, bread and pastries all spectacular, do not stop trying the Brownies (impressive)

title: (31797) Arraitz - 7 Ventas Arraitz
description: Good rest area in front of the benta Miguel restaurant, next to the national area, we slept next to some trucks that also stopped at night. A little further on there is a picnic area to spend the night as well, but when there was no one we turned around and decided to spend the night here. Quiet area despite being along the road.

title: (31421) Ardanaz - 52 Calle San Martín
description: Small and quiet area ideal for sleeping and climbing the Izaga rock

title: (31100) Puente la Reina - 1 Calle Irunbidea
description: Parking of an old flour mill

title: (31638) Eugi - 2 Calle Ospel
description: Parking at the entrance of the village Eugi, stone floor, near the marsh, tennis courts and the city, with fountain with wide mouth. Near the road but the night not very busy.

title: (31100) Puente la Reina - 8 Calle las Huertas
title_short: (31100) Puente la Reina - 8 Calle las Huertas
description: New parking two minutes from downtown. Very good location. with 4 places in the shade reserved for AC (although they do not respect them and they were occupied by cars...) Without services (there is a source to fill the tank and the City Council plans to set up a space for loading and unloading water), with a supermarket nearby and the town center at hand.

title: (31100) Puente la Reina - 12 Calle Cañada Real
title_short: (31100) Puente la Reina - 12 Calle Cañada Real
description: Dirt road next to the creek. Silent except for the sound of water.

title: (31100) Puente la Reina - 1 Camino
description: Small car park at the entrance of the town and a few meters from the Romanesque Bridge. Place of passage of the way of Santiago. Without services but ideal for visiting the town.

title: (31100) Puente la Reina - 7A Camino Viejo Mañeru
title_short: (31100) Puente la Reina - 7A Camino Viejo Mañeru
description: Next to the road. No parking restrictions signs. Close to town and the famous bridge. We parked day time only.

title: (31395) Leoz - NA-5100
description: Flat and wide grassy area next to the road, very comfortable and quiet place

title: (31395) Mendívil - 2 Calle la Fuente
description: Picnic area with tables next to the river. With water source. Quiet town.

title: (31291) Guirguillano - NA-7040
description: Small earthen car park at the top of a small pass. Lake view. Roadside, but quiet and quiet. Very good for a stopover. Surely nice walks to do in the surroundings.

title: (31638) - NA-138
description: Quiet place to spend the night. Quiet and well maintained, picnic area. In the same area, there are several paths that line the reservoir or go to the mountain.

title: (31438) Nagore - 20 Calle San Julián
description: Place to park at the edge of a village road: on one side houses, on the other a large reservoir with dam. between the road and the water there is a large stretch of lawn with bench and garbage cans. we are on October 17th and stayed 1h and a few, we have not seen a single person since we arrived, not a car not a cat!

title: (31438) - Carretera de Arce
description: 200 meters from the town of Nagore.

title: (31438) Navarra - 6 Calle la Concepción
description: Quiet place where they made a recreational marsh, near the marsh of Itoiz, nice place to rest

title: (31430) Aoiz - 104 Urbanización Barajitoa
description:
Beautiful town of half mountain with beautiful routes and trails. Near the Itoiz reservoir.

For black water use the first drain, make sure to lift the lid.

title: (31869) Udabe - Carretera de Basaburua
description: Very nice place high moor oaks to eat and lots of shade. We do not know if it will be possible to spend the night. We go with an AC benimar sport Up capuchina. There are no services. The highway is close but little traffic.

title: (31473) Abínzano - Unnamed Road
description: In nature

title: (31797) Lantz - Carretera de Belate
description: Parking, picnic area, nice, shady. Awakened to the sound of the bells of the cows that are in the meadow below.

title: (31638) Eugi -
description: Peaceful place accessible by a maintained gravel path (200m from the main road). Little traffic, accessible to vans, possibility to park 2 vehicles. The Arga River is below.

title: (31869) Jauntsarats - Carretera de Basaburua
description: Picnic area with several tables next to the river. with several parking spaces. eurovelo1 route.

title: (31438) Aoiz - Embalse de Itoiz
description: Free parking in a dead end road to see the dam. Very quiet with a beautiful view. nothing indicates that we can not spend the night. no service nearby, not even trash. Approach from the West side of the river as the road across the dam is blocked. do not let your satnav take you through the town, head out North past the Siemens plant and right past the football ground

title: (31866) Jauntsarats - 12 NA-411
description: Parking next to the Jauntsarats sports center. There is a box with plastic cover for gray and black water. tap with a hose to fill the water. Very quiet place to spend the night.

title: (31638) - Carretera del Quinto Real
description: Wilderness by the river. No passage, one to two possible locations. Soil of about level. Ideal for the night or a day bathing in river.

title: (31473) - NA-2420
description: Sengariz rest area. A forest of oaks to protect yourself from the sun and where you can stay at night.

title: (31638) Eugi - Carretera de Artesiaga
description: Clear area which should be used to store cut logs, therefore well encircled since the trucks are parked, suitable for any type of CC. We spent 2 quiet nights there, the area was empty of logs, a small river next to it. No traffic at night on the road

title: (31176) - Carretera Estella
description: Land parking next to a sports center in Muez, very quiet place, sleep without problem, there is a bar next door that is only there during the day

title: (31131) Cirauqui - 5 Calle Aniz
description: Quiet land parking for the night without services, a small town that surprised us and is worth seeing, mountain biking tours in wikiloc and some curious places walked, Roman road, walks through the countryside. Playground behind the parking lot with a bar.

title: (31638) Eugi - NA-1740
description: Space to spend the night ready for a stream with natural bathtub. The water is very fresh.

title: (31176) Villanueva de Yerri -
description: Great place by the azure lake, easy access by a good road, sometimes some locals will come with a dog

name: Camping Riezu - Navarra
title: (31176) Camping Riezu - Navarra
description: Camping Riezu near Lake Alloz. The welcome is friendly (the person who received us speaks French). There is a swimming pool, a small play area, a small supermarket and a restaurant.

title: (31796) Navarra -
description: Very quiet place with beautiful views. Access by track with the odd hole, it is an access track to some antennas.

title: (31150) Mendigorría - km. 1 Carretera Puente la Reina
title_short: (31150) Mendigorría - km. 1 Carretera Puente la Reina
description: Picnic area with several ravines and a large car park at the foot of the village.

title: (31291) Lerate - 67 Calle San Pedro
description: 'Parking with picnic table plus a Champion. At the edge of the lake with the possibility of swimming. Very calm with nice view. Forbidden to stay the night

name: Camping Aritzaleku
title: (31291) Camping Aritzaleku
description: Camping Aritzaleku.
